Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the town of Gardiner to impose a hotel and motel tax
Summary: Authorizes the town of Gardiner, in the county of Ulster, to impose a hotel and motel tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the town of Gardiner to impose a hotel and motel tax; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
